organizations: New York State Public High School Athletic Association Class C
lead_paragraph: Connor Sweeney threw for two touchdowns and Daquan Grobsmith ran for 116 yards and a score to lead Bishop Ludden to a 21-16 victory over No. 1-ranked Dobbs Ferry in the New York State Public High School Athletic Association Class C final in Syracuse.Bishop Ludden (12-1) snapped the Eagles’ 23-game winning streak and their quest for a fourth title in six years. Bishop Ludden, from Syracuse, has won 12 straight.
